summary: Most requested Code Status functionality appears implemented across backend (new CodeStatus variant + resident field + migration) and frontend (badge + dashboard/profile display + add/edit state). However, the diff also introduces unrequested audit/change-record structures and adds code status to a print report.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduces a CodeStatusChangeRecord audit/change-history type for code status changes (and related fields) which is beyond the requested scope (no audit trail requirement).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a persistent code status field with two values, migration, and UI controls/display; it does not request tracking or recording code status change events.

hallucinated_features.description: Displays Code Status in the Resident Profile print report output (print-only report).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 only requires Code Status be visible on the Resident Profile page; printing/report output is not requested and could be considered extra functionality.
